summary: Rio de Janeiro, often called Rio, is a major city in Brazil and was once the capital of the country. Founded in 1565 by the Portuguese, it became an important center for the Portuguese Empire. Rio has a rich history, serving as the seat of the royal court of Portugal and later as the capital of the Empire of Brazil. It's the second-largest city in Brazil and a popular tourist destination known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and iconic landmarks like Christ the Redeemer statue. Rio also hosts major international events, including the Olympics and the FIFA World Cup.
title: Rio de Janeiro
